tool_description: Identifies and extracts structured table data from documents, preserving row-column relationships and converting to structured format.

document_type.description: Document format: pdf, docx, html, csv, xlsx

table_index.description: Specific table to extract (0-based), or -1 for all tables

min_rows.description: Minimum number of rows to consider valid table

min_cols.description: Minimum number of columns to consider valid table

error_messages: Document not found: The specified document path does not exist.
Unsupported document type: Use supported formats: pdf, docx, html, csv, xlsx.
No tables found: The document does not contain any recognizable table structures.
Invalid table index: Specified table_index exceeds the number of tables found.
Table extraction failed: Unable to parse table structure due to formatting issues.
Invalid minimum values: min_rows and min_cols must be positive integers.
usage: Provide document_path and document_type. Set table_index for specific tables, adjust min_rows/min_cols to filter small tables, and set has_header appropriately.

tables_found.description: Total number of tables detected in document

extracted_tables.description: JSON-formatted strings representing extracted table data

table_dimensions.description: Dimensions of each table in format 'rows x columns'
